summary: Implements the Mixer‑TTS and Mixer‑TTS‑X neural text‑to‑speech models, converting input text into mel‑spectrogram representations. Handles model initialization, language‑model embedding extraction, tokenization, normalization, forward computation for training and export, inference generation of spectrograms, and integrates data pipelines and training/validation steps.
business_intent: Provides a ready‑to‑use component for building speech synthesis services such as virtual assistants, audiobooks, navigation prompts, or any application that requires converting written text into high‑quality synthetic speech.
